name: Submerged Secrets - A Haunted Submarine Adventure
name_original: Submerged Secrets - A Haunted Submarine Adventure
description:
This game was created as part of an experiment: how much A.I. can be used to make game creation easier? Check out this video from Albert Bozesan's YouTube channel for more info:

Story:

A sub was testing newly developed weapons when it was dragged to the depths of the ocean by a powerful sea creature that the test awakened. It has to be tamed before it destroys the submarine with you aboard.

You must brave the depths of the ocean, searching each room for items to help you in our quest to battle the sea creature and bring the submarine safely back to the surface.
